enterprise.name: Enterprise
enterprise.focus: Above + effort estimation, risk assessment, compliance

title-clear.name: Title clear?
title-clear.autoCheck: Verify title is specific (>3 words), contains actionable context, not generic like 'Fix bug' or 'Update code'
title-clear.description: Issue title is clear and descriptive

ac-present-testable.name: AC present and testable?
ac-present-testable.autoCheck: Check for `- [ ]` checkbox items in issue body; verify each contains a measurable/verifiable statement
ac-present-testable.description: Acceptance criteria exist and are testable

labels-correct.name: Labels correct?
labels-correct.autoCheck: Verify issue has at least one type label (bug/enhancement/story/epic) matching its content

story-sizing.name: Story sized appropriately?
story-sizing.description: Story points or size estimate is appropriate

priority-set.name: Priority set?
priority-set.autoCheck: Check if priority field is set in project board via `gh pmu view --json=priority`

dependencies-identified.name: Dependencies identified?
dependencies-identified.autoCheck: Check for `Refs #`, `Depends on #`, `Blocks #`, or `**Refs:**` patterns in body; verify referenced issues exist
dependencies-identified.description: Dependencies on other issues are documented

effort-estimate.name: Effort estimate present?
effort-estimate.autoCheck: Check for estimate/effort section or field in body (e.g., `**Estimate:**`, story points, time estimate)

risk-assessment.name: Risk assessment documented?
risk-assessment.description: Technical and business risks are identified

scope-boundaries.name: Scope boundaries defined?
scope-boundaries.autoCheck: Check for in-scope / out-of-scope sections or explicit boundary statements
scope-boundaries.description: Issue or document defines what is and is not in scope

success-criteria-measurable.name: Success criteria measurable?
success-criteria-measurable.autoCheck: Check for quantitative language, thresholds, or verifiable outcomes in AC or success criteria
success-criteria-measurable.description: Success criteria contain measurable, verifiable statements

actionable.name: Issue actionable?
actionable.autoCheck: Check for concrete next steps, clear requirements, or defined acceptance criteria
actionable.description: Issue contains enough information to begin work

_meta.note: This file tracks cross-cutting criteria filtered by reviewMode. Type-specific criteria (bug repro steps, story format, epic sub-issues, etc.) are defined inline in each command spec (review-issue.md, review-prd.md, review-proposal.md, review-test-plan.md) and are always evaluated regardless of reviewMode.
